textAfterTable: The experience of college life at Xavier University is superior. I can not imagine myself at another college that will provide me with the same joy that I get at Xavier. The students are great and the green space provides an excellent place to meet new people and play. Am learning a lot The classes are small and professors are dedicated to giving a one on one experience with the students. I have never been turned down by a professor to meet for further instructions after class. Professor seem to really enjoy their time at Xavier University which drives them to provide superior knowledge.
